function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Management of sick employees","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Indoor transmission of contagious diseases such as influenza a and sars-cov-2","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proposed factors such as ’closed spaces with poor ventilation,’ ’crowded spaces with many people,’ and ’close contact’ contribute to the formation of covid-19 clusters.","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate maintenance of air-conditioning and ventilation systems in specific buildings can lead to poor ventilation, increasing the risk of covid-19
